snippet: A Chinese-Japanese group has agreed to buy the Swedish automaker, which filed for bankruptcy in December, and will shift its focus to electric vehicles.
abstract: Chinese-Japanese group National Electric Vehicle Sweden agrees to buy Saab Automobile, which filed for bankruptcy in December 2011, and will shift its focus to electric vehicles.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese-Japanese group has agreed to buy the Swedish automaker, which filed for bankruptcy in December, and will shift its focus to electric vehicles.

headline.seo: Consortium Buys Saab Automobile and Plans Electric Cars
headline.print_headline: Saab Automobile Sold to an Investor Group
